CustomField.formula: IF( ( !ISNULL(vlocity_ps__StartDate__c) && ISNULL(vlocity_ps__EndDate__c) && TEXT(vlocity_ps__Status__c) == 'Placement Active' && Today() >= vlocity_ps__StartDate__c) || (!ISNULL(vlocity_ps__StartDate__c) && !ISNULL(vlocity_ps__EndDate__c) && TEXT(vlocity_ps__Status__c) == 'Placement Active' && Today() >= vlocity_ps__StartDate__c && Today() <= vlocity_ps__EndDate__c) , true, false)
CustomField.label: Active
